trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Элемент, связанный с данным одноранговым элементом автоматизации.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Строка, содержащая сочетание клавиш.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает сочетаний клавиш, предназначенные для <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"> </xref> , связанного с данным <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Сочетания клавиш для <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"> </xref> , связанного с данным <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTextBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Этот член представляет явную реализацию члена интерфейса.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Он может использоваться только если <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer>экземпляр приводится к <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>интерфейс.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTextBoxAutomationPeer>
